medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began about one week ago, characterized by sharp, constant pain that radiates to the back and worsens after eating. The patient has also experienced nausea and has not been eating much recently. Antacids provided no relief, while tramadol helped alleviate the pain. The pain is associated with eating.
past_medical_history: Prostate cancer s/p prostatectomy and penile prosthesis
medical_history.family_history: No family history of liver disease, diabetes, or premature CAD.
